result.title: TripleA-reno Board Game
result.description: The gamified use of the TripleAreno platform features on line will be reinforced offline by the TripleAreno board game The board game will allow the possibility of using the gamified features of TripleAreno offline to reinforce the motivation and engagement objective of the project The board game is extremely important ie in the case of residents of social housing companies including elderly population or people having a lower technology literacy

result.title: Consultations with National Data Protection Agencies
result.description: Before the smartphone app is rolledout to the households the consultations with National Data Protection Agencies are carried out and their recommendations are implemented Del 14 reports on this process and whether any issues were identified and how these were resolved This report sums up the results of the consultation processes with the National Data Protection Agencies of at least Germany Turkey and Spain

result.title: Project Website
result.description: Create and maintain a project website EeMMIP under the initiatve Energy Efficient Mortgages Initiative wwwenergyefficientmortgageseu The design of the EeMMIP website will be similar to that of EeMAP and EeDaPP aligning the three projects from a communication perspective It will be regularly updated offering general information about the project its partners and the relevant stakeholders It will inform about previous and forthcoming events and activities of the project as well as other relevant news on project topics

result.title: Best practice guidance for lending institutions and supervisory authorities
result.description: Best practice guidance for lending institutions and supervisory authorities on how to integrate the energy efficiency of EEM in credit risk assessments and the supervisory framework respectively This will also include recommendations for national legislations that could present an obstacle for implementation of EEM
